title: Writing Organizer
description: I started building this web application to help organize my own writing. Many of the tools avaliable did not work across platforms or were not what I was looking for, and so I set out to build my own.

title: Bookshelf
description: This project helps to track what books I am reading and allows the user to create lists and add bookmarks. Eventually I hope to use this project as part of an IoT device.

title: Portfolio
description: This site is a place that uses static pages to show off my resume and projects in a more interactive format.

title: Personal Blog
description: This full stack web application was built for Langara's CPSC 2600 class. For the project I designed a simple blog, complete with a primitive login system.

title: Art Show - Custom Wordpress Theme
description: This Wordpress theme was built for Langara's CPSC 2030 class, and was made to display my coworkers art pieces.
